DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to demonstrate safety and efficacy in patients with severe upper lobe predominant emphysema. For validity of the study, the results will be compared to patients that receive optimal medical therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Sequential Segmental Treatment of Emphysema With Upper Lobe Predominance (STEP-UP) Study
